snippet.title: Axis Descending - Beta Trailer
snippet.description:
PLAY IT HERE: http://www.axisdescending.com
VOTE FOR IT ON GREENLIGHT: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=784383283

Axis Descending is a Metroidvania Dark Souls-like where you dodge, slash, dash and shock your way through a story mode, randomized "Divecaching" levels, unique bounty hunt adventures and tons of treasure chests full of loot! 

Follow at: https://twitter.com/nujakujata
Music by Dylan Packard: https://soundcloud.com/dylan-gimli-packard
